::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod was surprized that the new bot had a vehical form. After all,
these were the Neo BEAST Wars. 
"Ok, just follow me." He said, to Siver Sting.
He started up his engine, and took off, heading for the Cybertronian
Fire.
